name: AgentUnzip
description: UnZip Files and Folders on the Agent
author: kodaren

inputs.name: pathToZipFile
inputs.label: Path to the zip file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the zip file which you want to unzip

inputs.name: pathToZipFolder
inputs.label: Path to folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the folder where you want unzipped content.

inputs.name: overwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite zip files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overwrites the existing files and directories
